content.detailedDescription:
I was in my apartment on the couch with my brother. i got up and went to the door to my balcony and looked up at the sky. keep in mind my sighting was less than 3-5 seconds. there are 3 bright stars in the sky outside my balcony every night, and this satellite was as bright as the brightest stars in the sky. 

right as i saw it i identified it as a satellite, i saw it moving upwards across the sky and a split second later it jolted sideways i knew it was a ufo so i screamed to my brother "ufo ufo!" 
and at the same time i flung the door open to get a better look at the sky. 
by the time i opened my door and looked up, it was gone. although i've had multiple other sightings, this one was my favorite because i was able to confirm to myself that i saw this object, and less than a second later the object wasn't in the sky. so for me personally, i know this was a legitimate sighting. my other sightings were a lot more strange so i don't know what to believe on those.


 i recently moved to winston-salem from raleigh. (i have also had multiple sightings in raleigh) i used to watch satellites all the time in raleigh. they just look like moving stars that continue on a path across the sky. 

i've been living here for 4 months now and this is my second sighting. i also saw an object the first couple weeks i was living here, that was shooting balls of light upwards into the air every few seconds as it moved across the sky, and began to smell a burnt smell in the air. never figured out what that was.

3-5 seconds series of events
*walk up to door*
less than 1 second- *spot the object moving steadily with my eye and identified as satellite*
less than a second- *the object moved sharply, what looked to be a substantial amount of distance, as i began yelling "ufo ufo" i was opening the door at the same time, the door frame moves in front of my vision, i see the sky again and scan it, the object is gone*
content.summary: Went to window of balcony and looked at the sky, saw a "satellite" jolted sideways

content.detailedDescription: Vacationing in florida one summer i woke late one night and stepped out on the balchony. there i observed a large disk shaped object with windows along the rim. inside were several people dressed in lab coats. many others had come out on their balchonies to watch/ we all went back to bed and forgot. twenty-four years later my daughter, who was in a different suite on a different floor at the time of the incident, brought it up. she remembered the same thing as i. then while watching a program showing various crafts she and i both recognized what we had seen. the individuals within the craft did not appear to be of alien origin but rather quite human. i have no recollection of the craft departing. what i recall is seeing other observers simultaneously turning as if in a daze, myself included, and returning to bed as though it never happened. certainly the potential number of witnesses could be in the hundreds.
content.summary: While vacationing in florida my daughter and i both witnessed a craft hovering above the pool late one night,from separate balchonies.

content.detailedDescription:
Saw three white lighted objects approach in nearly a straight line. they moved slowly, then entered a triangular formation. after entering a triangular formation, two of the crafts elevated and disappeared one at a time slowly. over the course of 30 seconds, like winking out, but did not move. the third remained. a fourth aircraft approached over the horizon moving quickly and left a reddish orange trail that dissappated quickly over approx 2 seconds. it then hovered in approximately the center of the original triangle. this craft hovered for approximately 2 minutes before it too winked out. the forth craft appeared more red/orange. the first group was all white.

i saw the lights and was intrigued. followed the. and thought might be fighter jets. they are rarely seen here. my intrigue increased and turned to fear after they began to slow and moved into triangle formation. i thought maybe ufos? fear increased and saw 4th object arrive and leave a trail that i have never seen before. i kept watching until i wad too fearful to continue and went inside.

i kept to myself until i started watching tapes over cali. what i observed was very similar.
content.summary: 4 ufos over pittsburgh area

content.detailedDescription: I was at universal studios in la when i looked up and saw one orange orb.  i asked my friends what they thought it was because it had an unusual flight pattern, it hovered, ascended, and appeared unusual.  i then stopped filming as i thought they were chinese laterns as more and more started to appear.  i would say 5 to 7 actually appeared and seemed to be coming from the nearby hills.  i didn't understand what i was seeing at the time.  the balls appeared to be spinning in the air or something.  finally someone drunk started jumping up and putting their hands in my video line which also motivated me to stop filming.
content.summary: Observed many fireballs in the sky that appeared to be to me chinese lanterns but learned of other sightings around the state.  there appeared to be many!

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: I went outside to smoke and saw a huge bright disc hovering above the airport, it changed to a bright orb and moved slowly out of site.  my first thought was that it was reflecting sunlight but the sun hadn't crested the mountains yet.  there was light in the sky cause it was dawn but no sun for it to reflect light.  it was big.
content.summary: I saw a bright disc

content.detailedDescription:
12-1-2013 9:30-9:40pm
i was watching tv in my living room,when my cat heard something and was looking out the south window.  i got up ,looked out the window and looked up, and above the trees,there were big round balls of yellowish-orange coming from the east in an evenly spaced distance one after another, going west. then, abruptly turned, in a diagonally direction, southwest across the field and disappeared.

they were coming single file, one after the other, evenly spaced, about ten , then came a >-shape formation of about six spheres with one in front,followed by several more single spheres coming again at an evenly spaced distance. they all like came to this on spot and turned abruptly and went southwest over the field and just disappeared.

i got my mom and she saw the also. i even went outside on the front steps to watch them and they  made no noise.

they were like guarding the > shaped formation, as i said there were several in front and several coming up the rear.

at first, i thought they were ultra lites, hand guilders, but there was no noise and there were to many, then of course, thought ufo's . i listened to the news that night and heard no reports and asked several people , but no one goes out after dark. so, forgot about it until i saw your thing on the computer.  so, i hope that helps!!!!!!!!!!!!
content.summary: Amazing

content.detailedDescription: Three of us, all witnesses, had just finished hot tubing after sneaking into the cliffs resort.  we walked down unto the beach and were discussing constellations when we noticed a tightly packed group of lights coming from the south.  they flew in various formations and had different colored flashing lights. when we first noticed them they were moving very quickly and changing direction in ways that seemed unnatural for aircraft, and then they flew north, the formations becoming increasingly elongated from the north to the south as they flew.  the group consisted of steadily pulsating lights, with the occasional bright white flash.
content.summary: Up to 15 aircraft, very high, moved in various formations from south of pismo to the north.

content.detailedDescription: After a night of playing bluegrass, a friend and i were leaving and wanted to go gold panning the next day.  so we left the pub and took back roads home.  we maybe had 3 beers each.  we were in no way intoxicated, it was a musical night yes, but incoherent, no.  so we are taking a back road to my friends house and we decide to stop for a pee break, to smoke a butt, and not rush home, ya know country life.  so were are smoking our cigarettes when we gaze at the sky and at the same time we notice 3 lights in a triangle shape moving as one.  they appeared about the same distance as the stars we see and were slowly moving south in the nightly sky.  as we watched with our jaw dropped to the dirt road confirming to each other we are seeing this turned slowly to the right and faded into the stars.  the hair still stands on my back writing this. what ever it was, it 1 used the stars as camouflage, and was massive.  my guess is if it was not ufo, it is marines or military personnel protecting out heliosphere or i don't know what, you tell me.
content.summary: Staring at clear night sky i saw 3 lights in a triangle the same distance as the stars move down my scope of the night stars it slowly moved down the sky turned slowly to the right and faded into the stars.  the hair still stands on my back writing this.

content.detailedDescription: January 1st, 2014 shortly after the new year countdown, time was around 12:10am - 12:14 am my girlfriend and i decided to have a cigarette outside in the balcony. upon looking up at the sky in the northeast direction towards san gabriel mountains, i noticed 2 bright orange/red objects hovering slow and low altitude. these object's we're flying and hovering side by side for about 8 minutes, immediately i called my family to come outside and witness themselves what i was seeing. at the same time these objects were flying, loud sirens from police or ambulance were heard near by. objects seemed to be heading west from northeast direction then changed direction north towards the san gabriel mountains and slowly disappeared. minutes after a third object appeared same as mentioned above but, third object was flying/hoovering very slow and looked similar like a chinese lantern but very brighter. the whole encounter lasted about 15 - 20 minutes. video footage was taken by family member. my actions & feelings were positive and excited to have spotted out these type of anomalies.
content.summary: Pair of bright orange/red lighted objects low altitude, hovering very slow from ne sky

content.detailedDescription: I'd been working on 4x4 blazer, i was taking pic of the work before and after,i had a firepit burning and 7 tiki lamps burning 4 sticking in the ground on poles and three of the can style tiki lamps, i was taking a break, bad back so inprovment to truck going really slow, sat in chair near firepit look up saw a orange/redess line traving across the night sky, the line seem as if it was strech northwest across southeast sky moving slowly, i though maybe it was airplane/jet trail smoke, the line was solid and did't not breakup like a jet trail would, so i watch for a few second, maybe 10-15, so i went in side to get cameara, and just started taking picture, the solid orange/redess line move on acrosss the sky to the east, first the pic were of brightlights, orange,reds,yellows,flashing like a rainbow moving, and then what seem like solar flare flashing as if the sky was on fires, this was around 12 midnight pm cal,time, went in and copy pic to laptop that is when i saw what i talk about above, it was cold out slightly cloudy earlyers but clear up as night came,. orion is in the southwesterns sky and that is were i pointed the cameara and started taking pictures,,so i would do a little to truck an take more pic, around 1am started taking pic again, to, the picture i'm posting here were shot around 130am 12/21/12, once i saw what i saw i was a little scards. everytime it was something differance in the sky as if they were working on something, i have picture of what look like gaint astroalien working on somethings, i took about 15-20 pic showen thems in flightsuits, some really crazy stuff, sorry i can'nt put the one of the alein in theirs ship looking directly at me, when i loaded those pic on to my laptop, i didn't go back out side this night. it was if i had just come face to face with an alein, it had to have seem me flashing picture and i was not going back out side. i have some 1500 picture, this was on the tip of what i was bless or just lucky to see, i can tell you this were are not along, i have pic on m-stick/card also,if you would like to see more contact me.
content.summary: Working on 4x4 taking pic of work saw light crossing sky started taking pic of sky

content.detailedDescription: Was travelling west on argyle forrest blvd towards oakleaf area my fiancee and i witnessed 5 orange red lights travelling out  of the nw heading se  we pulled over to the side of tje road around the rampart rd area and watched these five orb like objects until they disappeared behind the cloudd. they were definatlly not heicopters ot airplanes because they were only about 500 feet up and less than 300 feet from the car if they were helicopters or airplanes we would have definatly been able to hear them. they were eerilly quite.
content.summary: 5 orange/red lights moving nw to se slow speed no sound as lights went behind clouds they disappeared

content.detailedDescription:
On new years eve about 8:30 pm i saw 5 orange lights in the night sky.  they appeared to be linked in a slight bow shape and moving like a single craft of some kind. the center light seemed to be the center and the ones on each end the tips. i noticed them as i drove north on wolf angel rd in anderson twp and at first they were moving directly at me. the lights were moving from the west and turned to the north north east almost over me. my interpretation of what i was seeing was this was a huge aircraft of some kind at a very low altitude. as it turned to the north i got out of my car to listen for engine noise and there was none. the lights appeared to have a white core as i looked up at them from a 15 or so degree angle. i watched it move into the horizon and disappear, my visual contact lasted about 3 minutes. the total span from end to end was at least 1/4 mile and i estimate the altitude to be between 3 to 5 thousand feet. given that altitude and distance traveled i estimate the speed of movement to be around 150 knots. as i watched them disappear, looking at the rear, the lights were all at the same altitude and the spacing remained exact. while they were in the turn i couldn't tell if the craft banked but it didn't appear to do so. 

i'm amazed that i appear to be the only one to see this. i watched the news, went online and have asked several people i know if anyone saw or heard of this, nothing. several of the people i asked laughed and dismissed my story. but i was an airline pilot for 22 years, about half of that flying international, i know what i saw and i have never seen anything like this before. also, i have see parachute's lit at night but these lights didn't seem to be descending or loose altitude at all. if it was sky divers they are in credibility good.
content.summary: While driving i saw lights moving towards me. then turned north almost over me.

content.detailedDescription: Myself and the boyfriend of my better-half's daughter went for a smoke on the balcony and looked up at this bright orange light and stating talking about what it could be.. then it looked like it took off really fast and disappeared.... we then searched on the internet and found similar sightings and found a picture that resembled what we saw.... the strangest thing i have ever seen...
content.summary: Bright orange light observed at 50-62 degrees ne

content.detailedDescription: The first sighting occurred on new years eve of 2014 but news stations shrugged off like it was just fireworks. second sighting was by friends who said the same line of lights was back hovering or slowly moving in the sky. the lights remained for an unspecified amount of time before turning off one by one and disappearing completely. they said it caught their attention because it was odd for so many lights to be in an exact row without moving up or down. the outline of craft was not visible in dark. everyone was scared since this was the second time the lights appeared.
content.summary: Second sighting of line of liggts in kerman ca

content.detailedDescription: It was a hot night and we didn't have air conditioning. my parents were asleep so i snuck out to lay in the cool sand of a construction site next to our house. arcadia is a small city that stretches along the main road for about a mile or so. my house was on a hill at the end of the road, enabling me to clearly observe most of the city. i enjoyed looking at the lights of the city in the cool night breeze, and as i sometimes did, i was standing in the cool sand and looked down at the city lights. as i was doing this, i perceived that dogs were barking at the far edge of town. i didn't think anything of it until i realized that the barking was slowly getting louder and closer. this caused me to pay a little more attention and as i looked down at the city i saw a small patch of sky that was darker then the surrounding sky. as i watched, i noted that this dark patch was maybe 300 feet above main st, and coming straight at me moving slowly. i didn't see any lights and couldn't make out the shape until the thing was maybe 100 yards from my position. i began to hear a low ���rum���rum���rum noise coming from it. as the road it was following ended at a ���t��� it turned instantaneously to its left and i could finally see its shape, it looked like a blimp, and maybe a third of the way up it had a row of very dim shimmery round lights. it was somehow hard to see, yet i could clearly make out the shape. it moved on to my right until it went out of site behind a large hill. at that point i couldn't hear it anymore. i never saw it again, but it just occurred to me that maybe 2 years prior to this sighting, a saw a meteor fly over my house so low that we could hear a loud burning roar as it passed almost directly overhead. the shape i saw was going in roughly the same direction, no idea if they are connected.
content.summary: Blimp like object moving 300 feet above a small town main street causing dogs to bark in the middle of the night.

content.detailedDescription: On the night of 12/31/13 - 1/1/14 i was celebrating new years eve gambling at my local lottery deli. while i was playing, my brother came inside to where i was gambling and told me to come outside quickly to look at something. he didn't tell me what it was, he just turned and headed for the door outside. i had no idea what it was he wanted me to see, but i got up from my machine anyways and followed him outside. an employee of the establishment was also following. when we got outside, my brother went into the parking lot, and we followed him, and pointed in the southwest sky and said "look". when we looked in the direction he was pointing, there it was, three distinct red lights in the shape of a triangle. the lights were slowly pulsating and then light on the left side of the triangle appeared to move straight up in the sky until it was at the same elevation as the top light in the triangle, and then it moved back to its original place in the triangle. when then light resumed its position, all three lights suddenly accelerated to the south at a speed which i can only describe as faster than anything i've ever seen. the lights just disappeared. at the time of this sighting, the weather conditions were light clouds with a ceiling of approximately 25000 ft. visibility was good. the strangest thing about this sighting was that exactly 1 year to day prior, at almost the same time, my brother and i spotted the exact same thing in about the same place in the sky. i can only say that whatever it was, it was big and it accelerated at a speed that was out of this world. i don't know what i saw, but i know what i didn't see. it was not an airplane, helicopter, flares, a star or planet. it wasn't a meteor, it wasn't fireworks, or any of the other explanations that the skeptics will give. i'm not saying it was an alien craft, but i'm also not saying it wasn't. i don't know what it was i saw.
content.summary: Red lights in the shape of a triangle in the sw sky

content.detailedDescription:
We were dining with friends at our house.  my wife and one guest noticed the light poised over mt. ashland wanting me to photograph it thinking it was venus.  i snapped 4 pictures from my htc one cell phone in dusk light and continued to observe it for a few min.  i thought it was an unusual size and intensity for venus as well as suspecious about its position so i went into the kitchen to get the binoculars.  in the few moments i was away, the object moved to the right and descended to a new position in hover, so that when i returned it was no longer posing over the peak of mt. ashland.  i quickly put up the binoculars to have a better look.  as soon as i aquired the object in view it began to move slightly erraticly, somewhat slowly for the range but the object must have been quite large and in perspective the speed would have been tremendous from an aviation point of view.  the descent was seemingly deliberate, to the right and down the back side of the mountain pausing at tree top level for a moment before it decended from view. i got the impression it knew it was being observed.

that mountain peak has a large weather radar dome on its peak as well as several communications antenna that can barely be seen by the naked eye from our house about 20 miles away.  the object appeared to be slightly behind the mountain so some distance greater than the mountain peak.  through the binoculars i could not make out a defined shape as the object began moving as soon as i had it in view but, it had to be huge as it dwarfed the equipment on the mountain, surrounding terrain, forestry and ski lift equipment and was much much larger, brighter and  than aircraft that commonly fly over mt ashland on an instrument approach to the medford (mfr) airport.  of course arriving aircraft do not hover for 15 min and the descent angle i observed was pretty much parrallel to the mointains slope to the right, much much too steep for a commercial aircraft.

my wife reports that she and our visiting friend observed an bright orange belt parallel to the horizon illuminate not flash and sustain intensity for a few seconds before she called for me to come and look at it and get pictures.

photos were taken from an htc one phone, without flash, in various levels of onboard digital zoom...  i am sorry..
content.summary: Stationary for 15 min, descended with lateral track behind the mountian

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i were having a barbecue on our balcony when she saw it first.
i knew immediately it wasn't something normal.
i was taking the video when it either blasted off so fast we could not see or literally just disappeared.
content.summary: See full story

content.detailedDescription: I was 15 years old and out on our back porch feeding our cat and when i looked up to the sky i saw a huge triangle shaped ufo hovering above the tree, it made no sound, so i ran back in the house to get my parents and my siblings heard what was going on so they came also. we went back out to the deck and it was still there, so we were looking at it for a couple of minutes and then it began to move so my dad told all of us to get back in the house, so we did and i remember being in the kitchen and looking out the door window and seeing it coming towards the house, then it went right over our house so we then ran to the living room window to see if we could see it, it went across the street to the other house moving very slowly. then was hovering there for a few minutes, then moved again very slowly until we could not see it anymore. i wish i could see it again.
content.summary: Black triangle shaped ufo

content.detailedDescription: Approximately around 6:20 p.M. on january 3, 2014. i went outside to feel how cold it was and to view the crystal clear sky. as soon as i looked up i saw a brilliant, bright-white, spherical object traveling south-east(above our atmosphere at an incredible speed!!). it went in a straight line and then a made a quick "l" sort of manuever. i viewed all of this in less than a minute until it dissapeared from my sight. i'm wondering if anyone from virginia beach v.A. saw the same??
content.summary: Brilliant, bright white, spherical!!!!

content.detailedDescription:
12-4-13 approx. 8:36 pm i was at my work to pick up parts for the next day.  our shop is located a mile south of will rogers airport.  i was cleaning trash out of my work truck when i saw three orange-red arise from the west aproximatley 3-4 miles away.  they arose slowy one, two, three, then hoovered above the skyline for two to three seconds then continued to gain altitude and then flew directly over me the disappeared as they went past me.  the three lights keep a tight formation and stayed the same distance apart.  they made no sound they just pulsated as they flew.  they were not flares.

then after about two minutes after the 1 st three orbs a single one arose and flew and disappeared in the same manner.  this one i videoed with my eye phone after reviewing the video i see a oval disc in the sky that stays in the same place on the video.  the video is 1 minute 19 seconds. during the video turned the camera as turned to turn down the radio and turn off my interior light.
content.summary: I saw 4 orange-red lights arise from the treeline.  three arose one two three they travel up and hoovered the went over my head and disappeared.

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
Me and my 3yr old daughter were laying in the paddling pool on a warm, sunny, slightly cloudy midafternoon in england, in 2010. the object came from the north, flying south when it changed direction and flew up and behind a cloud and never reappeared.

the object wasnt fast, but wasnt slow.. it seemed to glide like a freezbie. the clouds were low on the day and the sun was very hot.. the object seemed to be glowing like a oven hotplate.. it wasnt till i watched a documentry and saw the same kind/colour object flowing a jumbo jet that i felt i needed to write this into a log. 

if i was to put a size to the object, i'd say abut the size of a small car. it had no marking and seemed to shimmer like the road on a hot day. it had no marking and was the classic disk shape, oh a solid.

i remember my daughter asking me what it was and having no idea. i called my partner, but the object never reappeared.. the strange thing was the cloud it disappeared behind was only a small summer cloud.

i dont no if i saw a ufo, but i no what ever i saw changed direction and disappeared and i've never seen anything like it since: other then on tv, but that was 3 of them and a lot bigger then the one i saw.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Dull glowing red disk

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i bought a home near bulverde, texas in may of 1995.  our home was located on rye drive, which is 6.2 miles outside (north) of loop 1604 just east of blanco road in san antonio.  we lived about 100 yards down rye from blanco road, with camp bullis and camp stanley right across blanco from us.  within a short time of moving to rye, and usually between 2 and 3 a.M., i began to notice completely silent unidentified flying objects in the sky over camp bullis/camp stanley that resembled low lying twinkling stars.  they would ascend from inside of/on top of? a large hill in camp bullis that featured a bizarre looking antennae array, would hover, sometimes alone and sometimes in formation, would slowly ascend and would then suddenly flit off in any/every direction, at very high speeds...The craft(s) featured very bright light(s), which would wax, wane and twinkle, running through the gamut of known colors....These objects could generally be seen on any clear night from midnight or later until shortly before the sun came up.  i (my wife, and several invited friends) saw these lights on a frequent basis for a number of years, even parking my car directly adjacent to blanco road and watching them with my binoculars...I could never determine exactly what they were because the lights were so bright that they obscured the objects....We even saw then through our moon roof flying over our car as we drove south and north on blanco road...I also saw them descending and disappearing either inside of, on top of and/or behind the hill with the unusual  antennae array in camp bullis���. although i moved from rye drive in late 2007, and have not looked for or seen the objects since, i believe they are probably still visible in the same location at the same time(s).   as an aside, i note that the objects looked identical to footage i have seen of area 51���.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Observed numerous ufo's over camp bullis and camp stanley,tx

content.detailedDescription: Looking up at the sw sky while on security duty next to the airport, sky was clear of clouds, stars visible, and then observed a suspicious unidentified craft travelling in a ne direction. i have never seen an aircraft of this configuration or one at that altitude before, and i have looked at many typical aircraft types in those skies. this craft was a triangular shape--i could barely make out the outline against the dark sky--and it had 3 solid white lights on the bottom side (one at each point of the triangle). i suspect it was at about the altitude that single engine small planes are at, but there is no way for me to know; and the size of it is unknown, but i am guessing it was very large. it was travelling at a high rate of speed because it was only visible for roughly 6 seconds before it went out of sight into the light pollution in the ne sky. no engine noise was heard like you would expect from a large jet engine and for a craft going that fast.
content.summary: Triangle-shaped craft w/3 lights, moving fast, only visible 6 sec.

content.detailedDescription: I was standing in the middle of the street by my house in tustin, with my brother, and we were watching new year's eve fireworks on the eastern horizon. when the fireworks were winding down, i noticed a bright orange light about the size of jupiter slowly rising up from the northeastern horizon. it seemed to hover for awhile and then turned to slowly move in a southward direction. as it was traveling south, i noticed another identical orange light rising up from the eastern horizon maybe 2 or 3 degrees south of where the first one had come up from. as the second light approached the first light, the first light turned to fly north and the second light followed it, not too closely, but not too far from it either. then a third identical orange light started rising up from the same spot where the second one had risen up from and this third light also followed the same path as the second light. it was a somewhat shorter distance from the second light than the second light had been from the first light. then i noticed that the first light was no longer visible and there was just the second and third still in the sky. i decided it was time to go into the house for the binoculars. when i came out the second and third lights were also gone. for a second i was disappointed but then i noticed a fourth identical light was rising up from the same spot as the second and third had come from. i viewed this fourth light through the binoculars, but i still couldn't see any solid object or any flashing lights. it was still only just an orange light. i gave the binoculars to my brother to see if he could see it any better than me. he also couldn't see any object or any additional lights on it. he concluded that if it was a plane it had to be at least 2 miles high for us to not be able to see it. after this fourth light followed the same path as the first 3 lights then it faded out just like the other 3 had done. we knew these were definitely not helicopters or normal aircraft. i figured that if they were not ufo's then they must have been some kind of military aircraft that we are not familiar with yet. the whole episode lasted about 15 minutes.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Four orange lights rose up from eastern horizon and slowly flew northward 15 minutes after midnight while new year's eve celebrations were winding down.

content.detailedDescription: I got up to the bathroom around 4am n the window was open out in the bright sky i could see light waves above the clouds i watchd n noticed three round tite close orbs in the sky pulsating and spining realy fast i woke my girlfriend and got my binoculars i could see it clearly it was as if i could see some kind of energy force within the orbs for around an hour we watched until cloud cover eventualy came and it wasn't visible but the light above the clouds was amazing the like of whitch i've never seen
content.summary: Three large pulsating orbs spining way up in the atmosphere i woke mt girlfriend up and she also observed it after calling me crazy

content.detailedDescription: On december 26,2014  me and a few friends were driving down sherman way in van nuys ,california to a restaurant when i had the urge to turn around a head west to woodland hills to eat. so i made a u-turn and notice a shinny bright bluish white light slowly coming down out of the sky,burly stopping about 7 story's above the ground  silently hovering in one spot as we past the object it disappeared ,and then further up there was 5 more repeating the same pattern as the first.As we past under the last one my friend who was a total skeptic manage to snap a pic,now shes a believer. as i passed under them i glance and seen a weird triangle shape craft about 25 long was not really big but im sure 2 men could fit in it easy, when she should me the photo after i said its a weird triangle i freaked out. one when we drove under this thing we didn't see 5 lights 3 on each point and 2 in the middle we seen one solid blue bright whitish light,as well as the shape of this thing i never seen anything like this. you be the judge. this is a actually picture not cgi or anything with computers if someone knows what this thing is please inform me.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Unlike anything i ever seen and there were 5

content.detailedDescription: I was observing jupiter with my telescope and was prompted on social media of a sighting earlier in the evening. after some time with the scope i put it away and was prepared to go to bed but took a last look to the s.E. sky as the earlier reports stated. i noticed an orangish light behaving strangely and watched it for a couple of minutes and then went inside to wake up my wife, she and i watched it for about 40 min. and then she went back to bed. during the observation, we compared the directional details as they happened and agreed every time. it seemed to have what we can best describe as thruster type light or flash emanating from the top occasionally. i continued to watch after my wife went to bed and eventually it faded into just a totally stable small star like light that that dimmed permanently. it was cold and clear the entire time and many shooting stars were observed as were various aircraft in typical flight characteristics with audible motors. no odd noises were apparent. created a feeling of wonder and amazement in both my wife and i.
content.summary: Hovering light pulsating, slightly unstable, wobbly and slight movements on all axis.

content.detailedDescription: Aurora, co, new years day 2014 at 12:12am, my backyard faces directly east, i let my dog out and noticed as soon as i opened the door 2 unusual yellowish lights in the ne, they were lined up, at 1st i thought it was airplanes or helecopters but they looked differant and were just hovering, then a 3rd one appeared and the 3 formed a triangle, i went inside to get my camera, when i came back outside the 3rd one was either gone or the light went out,this is the 1st picture i took,then i saw one large one was rising up beyond the trees in the ne distance,2nd picture,i wondered if these were japanese lanterns but it was a cloudy night-this was just 3 hours before it started to snow, so i wasn't able to see neighborhood fireworks since it was cloudy,i just heard them. after the big one rose in the sky,there were 3 smaller ones again and they lined up in a straight line about the larger one for a few seconds,this is the beginning of what i filmed. then this formation broke up and the smaller lights spread out in a zig zag with the largest one still hovering and moving around in the sky below, more smaller lights appeared, some blinked, the video doesn't show all that i saw since i was zooming in and trying to keep the camera steady, there were a total of 7 accross the sky hovering and blinking, at this point i was a little freaked out so i stopped filming and went inside, so i really don't know how long they were out there, but right before i stopped filming it seemed the lights were starting to go out or they took differant direction and were gone,so when i went inside there were only 2 small ones left in the sky and the large one still hovering below.  i am pretty much a skeptic about ufos until i saw this, later than morning i started looking for sightings online,it was so noticeable i wondered how many other people saw this. i had to wait until i used someone else's laptop to report this because mine won't take any pictures or videos right now due to some kind of problem with it. since i waited until now though i have been checking online and noticed alot of other sightings in other areas on new years morning not long after midnight.
content.summary: Observed unexplained bright lights that went in formation twice,saw 1 large one appear to come up from ground,more appeared/lit up
